stimulusHtml: Use the data in the table to estimate the instantaneous rate at which the temperature of the oven is changing at time t = 10. Show the computations that lead to your answer. Indicate units of measure.

features.html:
t (minutes) 0 4 8 12 16
H(t) (Â°C) 65 68 73 80 91

The temperature, in degrees Celsius ( C), of an oven being heated is modeled by an increasing differentiable function H of time t, where t is measured in minutes. The table above gives the temperature as recorded every 4 minutes over a 16-minute period.
